mapper.select: SELECT sh_effluentemission.*,company.company_name,company.county_id,county.COUNTY_NAME FROM sh_effluentemission LEFT JOIN company ON sh_effluentemission.factory_id=company.com_id LEFT JOIN county ON company.county_id=county.COUNTY_ID where sh_effluentemission.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into sh_effluentemission (id, year, factory_id, activity_note, activity, activity_unit, voc_efficency, pm10_emission, pm25_emission, so2_emission, nox_emission, voc_emission, nh3_emission, co_emission, oc_emission, bc_emission, emission_unit, scccode, source_discrip, flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{factoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityNote,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{activity,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{activityUnit,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vocEfficency,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{vocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{emissionUnit,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{scccode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sourceDiscrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, factory_id = #{factoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activity_note = #{activityNote,jdbcType=CHAR}, activity = #{activity,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, activity_unit = #{activityUnit,jdbcType=CHAR}, voc_efficency = #{vocEfficency,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pm10_emission = #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pm25_emission = #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, so2_emission = #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nox_emission = #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, voc_emission = #{vocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nh3_emission = #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, co_emission = #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, oc_emission = #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bc_emission = #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, emission_unit = #{emissionUnit,jdbcType=CHAR}, scccode = #{scccode,jdbcType=CHAR}, source_discrip = #{sourceDiscrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update:
update sh_effluentemission
year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR},
factory_id = #{factoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activity_note = #{activityNote,jdbcType=CHAR},
activity = #{activity,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
activity_unit = #{activityUnit,jdbcType=CHAR},
voc_efficency = #{vocEfficency,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pm10_emission = #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pm25_emission = #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
so2_emission = #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
nox_emission = #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
voc_emission = #{vocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
nh3_emission = #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
co_emission = #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
oc_emission = #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
bc_emission = #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
emission_unit = #{emissionUnit,jdbcType=CHAR},
scccode = #{scccode,jdbcType=CHAR},
source_discrip = #{sourceDiscrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
